mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.status AS "status", a.version AS "version", a.create_user AS "createUser", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_user AS "updateUser", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.name AS "name", a.code AS "code", a.value AS "value", a.remark AS "remark", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.dictionary_id AS "dictionary.id", d.code AS "dictionary.code", d.name AS "dictionary.name", p.name AS "parent.name", p.code AS "parent.code"
LEFT JOIN t_sys_dictionary_item p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN t_sys_dictionary d ON d.id = a.dictionary_id
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(a.order_no) FROM t_sys_dictionary_item a WHERE a.status = #{STATUS_NORMAL}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_dictionary_item( id, status, version, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, name, code, value, remark, order_no, parent_id, dictionary_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{status}, 0, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{name}, #{code}, #{value}, #{remark}, #{orderNo}, #{parent.id}, #{dictionary.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sys_dictionary_item SET status = #{status}, version = version +1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = #{updateTime}, name = #{name}, code = #{code}, value = #{value}, remark = #{remark}, order_no = #{orderNo}, parent_id = #{parent.id}, dictionary_id = #{dictionary.id} WHERE id = #{id}
